home_subtitle: AI-powered scientific paper writing with agentic workflow
home_features_dataCollection_description: Automated literature search and document processing
settings_description: Configure your application preferences and API settings
settings_api_description: Set up your OpenRouter API key and select AI models for paper writing
settings_api_howToGet: How to get your API key:
settings_api_step1: Visit openrouter.ai and create an account
settings_api_step2: Go to the API Keys section
settings_api_requiresApiKey: Valid API key required to load models
settings_parameters_description: Fine-tune AI model behavior for optimal paper writing results
settings_parameters_temperatureDesc: Controls randomness in responses. Lower values are more focused and deterministic.
settings_parameters_maxTokensDesc: Maximum number of tokens to generate in a single response.
settings_parameters_topPDesc: Controls diversity via nucleus sampling. Lower values focus on more probable tokens.
settings_parameters_frequencyPenaltyDesc: Reduces repetition by penalizing tokens based on their frequency.
settings_parameters_presencePenaltyDesc: Encourages talking about new topics by penalizing tokens that have appeared.
settings_citations_description: Configure how citations and bibliographies are formatted and managed
settings_citations_autoCitationDesc: Automatically generate citations when referencing sources
settings_confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to defaults? This action cannot be undone.
llm_config_warning_description: Please configure your LLM settings and select an AI model in Settings to use this functionality.
home_hero_subtitle: Structure your research thoughts into well-organized academic papers with AI-guided workflow. Think systematically, write effectively.
home_features_subtitle: Our AI guides you through every step of the academic writing process
home_features_citations_description: Upload references and work with AI to organize your citations systematically while understanding their connections to your research.
home_features_outline_description: Collaborate with AI to develop logical paper outlines that help you think through and structure your research arguments effectively.
home_features_section_description: Work through each section methodically with AI guidance to articulate your thoughts using proper academic conventions and citations.
home_features_quality_description: Collaborative review process helps you refine your thinking and ensure clarity, proper citations, and academic standards.
home_process_subtitle: A structured approach to help you think through and organize your research systematically
home_process_step1_description: Upload your research papers, add citations, and define your research focus. Our AI analyzes your sources to understand the context.
home_process_step2_description: Work with AI to develop a logical structure with section organization, key arguments, and citation strategies that reflect your thinking.
home_process_step3_description: AI assists you in structuring and expressing your thoughts with proper academic tone and citations. Review, refine, and think through each section.
home_cta_subtitle: Join researchers worldwide who use AI to better organize and express their research thoughts systematically.
format_step_subtitle: Configure your paper type and target length
format_target_language_help: Language for the generated paper content
format_citation_subtitle: Configure how citations and references are formatted in your documents
format_inline_citation_help: How citations appear within the text
format_include_urls_help: Add web URLs to online source citations
format_include_doi_help: Add Digital Object Identifiers to academic sources
newpaper_step_format_description: Configure paper format and citation style
newpaper_step_documents_description: Add citations, figures, and supplementary materials
newpaper_step_focus_description: Define your research focus and key questions
newpaper_step_outline_description: Define your paper outline and generate title suggestions
newpaper_step_writing_description: Your paper setup is complete and ready for the writing process
documents_citations_subtitle: Add references that will inform your paper ({count} citations)
documents_abstract_placeholder: Enter the paper's abstract or summary...
documents_no_citations_subtitle: Add citations manually or upload a BibTeX file to get started
documents_missing_url_help: Add a URL to enable the AI to read and analyze this webpage content during the writing process.
documents_missing_url_doi_help: Add a URL or DOI to enable the AI to read and analyze this paper in detail during the writing process. This significantly improves writing quality.
documents_notes_placeholder: Add your notes about this paper...
documents_citation_required_help: Please add at least one citation to proceed.
documents_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this citation?
documents_delete_batch_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected citation(s)?
documents_bibtex_no_citations: No valid citations found in the BibTeX file. Please check the file format.
documents_bibtex_error: Failed to parse BibTeX file. Please check the file format and try again.
documents_validation_required: Please add at least one citation before proceeding to the next step.
focus_step_subtitle: Define your research focus for your {paperType} paper
focus_research_focus_placeholder: Describe your research focus, including key themes, questions, gaps, and methodologies.
focus_research_focus_help: You can use the AI assistant below to help develop and refine your research focus
focus_ai_help_title: Let me help you develop your research focus through guided questions
focus_message_placeholder: Describe your research idea, ask questions, or request refinements...
focus_generate_confirm: This will replace your current research focus. Are you sure you want to continue?
focus_clear_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear the chat history? This action cannot be undone.
focus_research_required_help: Please define your research focus to proceed.
focus_validation_required: Please define your research focus before proceeding to the next step.
focus_ai_error: Failed to get response from AI. Please check your API settings and try again.
focus_api_not_configured: OpenRouter API key not configured. Please check your settings.
focus_quick_specific: Can you help me make this more specific?
focus_quick_gap: What research gap does this address?
focus_quick_citations: How do my citations relate to potential research questions?
focus_ai_welcome_base:
Welcome! I'm here to help you define your research focus for your {paperType} paper.

{agenda}
focus_prompts_research_agenda: What specific research question or hypothesis will your study address?
focus_prompts_research_gap: What gap in existing research does your study aim to fill?
focus_prompts_review_agenda: What topic or field will your review comprehensively examine?
focus_prompts_review_gap: What aspects of the literature need systematic analysis or synthesis?
focus_prompts_perspective_agenda: What new viewpoint or interpretation will your perspective offer?
focus_prompts_perspective_gap: What current understanding or approach needs a fresh perspective?
focus_prompts_protocol_agenda: What methodology or procedure will your protocol establish?
focus_prompts_protocol_gap: What standardized approach is currently missing in the field?
focus_prompts_reply_agenda: What points from the original work will you address or clarify?
focus_prompts_reply_gap: What aspects of the discussion need further elaboration or correction?
focus_prompts_letter_agenda: What key message or finding will your letter communicate?
focus_prompts_letter_gap: What important point needs to be brought to the community's attention?
outline_step_subtitle: Define sections outline for your {paperType} paper
outline_title_generation_subtitle: AI-generated title suggestions based on your citations
outline_ai_title_suggestions_desc: Generate AI-powered title suggestions based on your citations
outline_no_citations_desc: Add citations in the previous step to generate AI title suggestions.
outline_analyzing_citations: Analyzing research focus and your citations to generate title suggestions...
outline_title_placeholder: Write your custom paper title here...
outline_clear_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all sections? This cannot be undone.
outline_create_outline_desc: Choose how you'd like to create your paper outline. You can use AI assistance or start from scratch.
outline_ai_requires_citations_desc: Add citations in the Documents step to enable AI-powered outline suggestions.
outline_generating_structure: Generating paper outline structure and populating all content with AI...
outline_point_placeholder: Describe what will be discussed in this point...
outline_no_points: No key points defined yet. Add points to outline what will be discussed in this section.
outline_references_auto_suggest: References are automatically suggested when you generate key points with AI
outline_references_selected: {selected} of {total} references selected for this section
outline_no_citations_section: No citations available. Go back to the Documents step to add references.
outline_generation_failed: Failed to generate AI outline suggestions after {retries} attempts. Please try manual creation or check your API settings.
outline_keypoints_failed: Failed to generate AI suggestions after {retries} attempts. Please try again or add content manually.
outline_ai_generating_content: AI is generating key points and references for this section...
outline_waiting_for_ai: This section is waiting to be processed by AI
writing_api_key_not_configured: OpenRouter API key not configured. Please check your settings.
writing_draft_saved_success: Draft saved successfully! Redirecting to drafts...
writing_draft_save_failed: Failed to save draft. Please try again.
writing_start_description: Start the AI-assisted writing process for your {paperType} paper
writing_sequential_description: Writing sections sequentially with specific word targets...
writing_generation_success: Your paper has been generated successfully
writing_generation_description: The AI will write the complete paper based on your outline, citations, and research focus. This may take several minutes.
writing_complete_outline_warning: Please complete the outline step before starting the writing process
writing_review_instruction: Review the generated content and click "Finish & Save Draft" when ready.
drafts_page_description: Manage and edit your generated papers
drafts_chat_description: Discuss your paper with AI assistant
drafts_select_instruction: Select a draft from the list to view and edit it
drafts_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"?
drafts_save_failed: Failed to save draft. Please try again.
drafts_assistant_welcome: I helped you create this {paperType} paper titled "{title}". The paper is {wordCount} words long and uses {citationCount} citations. You can edit the content below or ask me questions about the paper.
drafts_api_key_required: OpenRouter API key is required for chat functionality. Please configure it in Settings.
drafts_get_started: Create your first paper to get started with the AI-powered writing assistant
settings_page_description: Configure your AI models and generation parameters
settings_model_settings_description: Configure your AI model, API key, and generation parameters
settings_api_key_help: Get your API key from OpenRouter Keys
settings_temperature_description: Controls randomness in responses. Lower values are more focused and deterministic.
settings_max_tokens_description: Maximum number of tokens to generate in a single response (default: 8192).
settings_openrouter_tab_description: Use OpenRouter API to access multiple AI models
settings_custom_tab_description: Connect to your own OpenAI-compatible LLM server
settings_custom_endpoint_help: Base URL for your OpenAI-compatible API server
settings_custom_api_key_help: API key for authentication (leave empty if not required)
settings_custom_model_name_help: Model identifier to use in API requests
settings_parameters_card_description: Fine-tune AI model behavior for optimal paper writing results
home_rationale_subtitle: Transparent, ethical AI-assisted research that maintains human control
home_rationale_traceable_description: Every AI interaction is logged and can be exported as a comprehensive report, ensuring full transparency in the writing process.
home_rationale_human_control_description: Rather than generating papers instantly, we guide you through each step with meaningful human oversight to create better, more thoughtful research.
home_rationale_language_barrier_descript: Focus on your scientific work while AI assists with academic writing conventions, helping non-native speakers express their research clearly.
home_rationale_quality_description: Step-by-step human verification ensures quality, accuracy, and authentic scholarly contribution rather than automated content generation.
cover_page_subtitle: Continue working on existing drafts or start a new paper
cover_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this draft? This action cannot be undone.
cover_create_new_description: Start a new research paper from scratch with our guided workflow
cover_recent_drafts_description: Continue working on your existing drafts and papers
cover_empty_state_message: Get started by creating your first research paper using our guided workflow system.
drafts_configure_llm_first: Configure your LLM settings first to create a new paper
drafts_llm_config_required: Please configure your LLM settings before creating a new paper.
download_markdown_description: Raw markdown format, perfect for version control and editing
download_docx_description: Microsoft Word format, ready for submission and collaboration
download_report_description: Transparency report documenting format, research focus, outline, and AI workflow process
revisions_page_description: Review, edit, and refine your papers with AI-powered suggestions
revisions_upload_description: Upload your own paper for AI-assisted revision and improvement
revisions_create_first: Create your first revision project by uploading a paper or importing from drafts
revisions_confidentiality_warning: When using non-local LLMs for peer review or confidential content, you may be sharing sensitive information with third-party services. Ensure compliance with your institution's confidentiality requirements.
revisions_drop_description: Drag and drop your file here, or click to browse
revisions_help_title: Getting Started with AI-asssisted Text Revision
revisions_help_intro: Select any text in the editor below to access AI revision tools. You can:
revisions_help_ai_revise_desc: Get intelligent suggestions to improve grammar, clarity, and style
revisions_help_ai_fact_check_desc: Verify factual claims and get source recommendations
revisions_help_usage: Simply highlight text and use the bubble menu that appears to access these features.
revisions_no_selected_description: Select a revision from the sidebar or create a new one to get started
revisions_no_drafts_available: No completed drafts available to import
revisions_docx_coming_soon: DOCX support coming soon. Please use .md or .txt files.
revisions_docx_generation_failed: Failed to generate DOCX file. Please try downloading as Markdown instead.
revisions_upload_warning_message: Do not upload peer-review articles or confidential content unless you are using a local LLM. Uploading sensitive content may violate required confidentiality agreements and share information with third-party services.
bubble_menu_no_text_selected_revise: No text selected. Please select some text to revise.
bubble_menu_no_text_selected_fact_check: No text selected. Please select some text to fact-check.
chatbot_placeholder: Ask me about your paper revisions...
chatbot_welcome: Hi! I can help you with paper revisions, citations, and writing suggestions. What would you like to know?
chatbot_no_project_selected: No project selected. Please select a revision project to enable the AI Assistant.
chatbot_analyzing_content: I'm analyzing your paper content and can help you with revisions, citations, and writing suggestions.
create_draft_modal_description: Enter a draft identifier to help you organize your work.
create_draft_identifier_placeholder: e.g., AI Ethics Research, Climate Study 2024
create_draft_identifier_in_use: This identifier is already in use
create_draft_letters_numbers_only: Please use letters and numbers only
chatbot_ready_to_help: Hi! I'm ready to help you with your paper "{title}".
filedrop_description: Drop files here or click to select
filedrop_bibtex_description: Drop BibTeX file here or click to select
documents_figures_description: Select images, charts, diagrams, and visual materials for your paper
documents_supporting_description: Select related documents, source codes, or other materials
documents_processing_warning: Please wait for all files to finish processing before proceeding to the next step.
article_search_no_results: No articles found for your search.
article_search_try_adjusting: Try adjusting your search terms or filters.
article_search_enter_terms: Enter search terms to find scientific articles.
article_search_search_pubmed: Search across millions of publications from PubMed.
